title: High Quality Cannabis Oil, Flower, & Pre-Rolls | Lowell Farms
description: California's most popular pre-roll contains only the finest organic cannabis. Get vapes, smokes, and oils delivered from 350 store locations.
cleaned_text: By providing your contact information, you consent to receive messages about special offers and agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. Update your location: California's best selling pre-roll. Classic Packs Our award winning packs that started it all. Fine craft, transparency, and modern convenience weren't terms typically associated with the cannabis industry, then we came along. Sun Grown Flower Cannabis is meant to be enjoyed, shared. Our greenhouse grown and pesticide free cannabis flowers are contained in food-grade glass to keep things as pure as nature intended. Individual Pre-roll Our individual, full flower pre-rolls are loaded with 1 gram of artisan craft cannabis. No shake, no trim, just like every other pre-roll we've brought to market. Infused Pre-roll Enjoy the curated, effect-based blends you know and love, now infused with artisanal hash. A truly original and satisfying cannabis experience. Timeless Bubble Hashish This is the classic hash you know and love. Flavorful, versatile, classic. Lowell's Bubble Hash pays homage to the early B.C. Hashishians, the Parisian Hash Clubs, and the days of Woodstock. Full-Melt Hashish Lowell Full-Melt Hash is made using only our highest quality hash, preserving all of the natural trichomes, rich flavors and plant resins of the diverse cannabis plant. Age Cured Rosin Lowell's Aged Cured Rosin is extracted from subsequent presses of the same Full-Melt Hash. We age cure these small batches by agitating and storing the rosin in ideal conditions. Artisanal Live Rosin Lowell's Live Rosin is extracted from the first press of our Full-Melt Hash and is in monoterpenes, offering a more potent and dynamic experience. Our artisans select only the highest quality strains for conversion into our rosin products. 510 Cart Enjoy our liquid Live Rosin on-the-go with our full-spectrum concentrate cartridge. Inside you'll find the same non-distillate, solventless Live Rosin which has been extracted from our artisan craft cannabis flowers. Solventless Vape Enjoy our liquid Live Rosin on-the-go with our full-spectrum concentrate vape. Inside you'll find the same non-distillate, solventless Live Rosin which has been extracted from our artisan craft cannabis flowers. Full-spectrum. No solvents. Take our solventless rosin with you wherever you go. Exclusives Shop limited edition Lowell exclusives that can only be purchased directly from the source. Quicks Eighth Packs Lowell's curated effect-based blends, now available in .35G smokes. Perfect for a short escape or a relaxing moment. Quicks come with 10 smokes per pack - enjoy solo or share with your
